entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then southwest 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
